meanings.sent1: The fainters were helped to a chair.

meanings.sent3: At the magic show, the fainters always added an unexpected twist.
meanings.sent4: In the heat, the fainters melted away like ice cream.

meanings.definition: A group of people who faint.
meanings.sent1: The fainters gathered in the hallway after the gas leak.
meanings.sent2: The paramedics rushed to the scene to help the fainters.
meanings.sent3: During the scary movie, the group of fainters provided comic relief.
meanings.sent4: The sudden news caused the fainters to collapse like a house of cards.
meanings.sent5: The choir of fainters created a dramatic scene at the concert.

meanings.sent3: The fainters at the haunted house were all part of the act.
